alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Schoharie County through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilboa, or 18 miles northwest of Hunter, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Conesville, South Gilboa, South Jefferson and Welch Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
